tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE disease_control_records (
    record_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_administered VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Disease_Recordings (
    recording_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    recording_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    recorded_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient_Details (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Health_Officials (
    official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    official_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    location_assigned VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE screenings (
  screening_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  date DATE,
  result VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE health_workers (
  worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  expertise VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE public_health_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  symptoms TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  disease_id INT REFERENCES diseases(disease_id),
  record_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE contact_tracing (
  tracing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  contact_date DATE,
  contact_location VARCHAR(100)
)
